items.name: Bribed
items.effect: `+1 DT` to `Interrogate`. Pay 15 subs: auto-succeed (still roll result table)

items.name: Panicked
items.effect: `-1 DT` to `Interrogate`. Always use Flee behavior at half `Move` (ignore AI roll)

items.name: Escort
items.effect: `-1 DT` to `Interrogate`. Can't `Interrogate` on spot. Carry to your edge to score

items.name: Hostile
items.effect: `-2 DT` to `Interrogate`. Start marked Hostile (use Atk columns)
